description: Students examine a variety of texts used in a particular professional or disciplinary field such
as economics, the sciences, medicine, art, music, and theology.  Coursework enhances listening
and reading skills in specialized areas of the work world as well as writing and speaking
proficiency  in the workplace across the German professions.  Recommended for students
considering an internship in Germany. Taught in German.  It includes strategies for writing
letters, resumes, reports, and documented professional work in German.  Prerequisite:
